Name: Neko Loop
About the game: Welcome to Neko Loop. Neko Loop is a roguelike game with resource management and constant progression where your decisions have great influence on the course of each game. Unlock secrets, defeat bosses, meet characters and do your best to help Selina get back home. EQUIPMENT SYSTEM Equip powerful items and become stronger. CARDS AND RESOURCES: Unlock cards with various effects, get resources and use them to your advantage COMBAT Face a variety of enemies in intense battles: And much more!
Meta Title: Neko Loop: Dec 23, 2022, Fifth Vertex and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Neko Loop? Check out the release date (Dec 23, 2022), developer insights from Fifth Vertex, and a complete game summary.
